description.p: QTads is a cross-platform, multimedia interpreter for TADS games. It is fully compatible with HTML TADS (aka "Multimedia TADS.") Both TADS versions in use today (v2 and v3) are supported.
Most TADS games are free and can be downloaded from places like the Interactive Fiction Database (https://ifdb.tads.org) and the Interactive Fiction Archive (https://ifarchive.org).
Too many changes and bug fixes to list them all. Some important ones:

ul.li: Improved audio engine with better sound quality.
Audio is now streamed in real-time where in the past it had to be decoded in whole prior to playback, causing a big delay.
MIDI music is now played using an internal MIDI synthesizer (FluidSynth).
The maximum text width of the main window is now configurable.
